text: Could you please state your full name for the record.

text: Good morning, Ms. Shchogol.  My name is Michael Schlagnhaufer.  I represent Kelly O' Donnell in a lawsuit you brought against her regarding an accident on October 31, 2017.  Is that your understanding?
